name: claude-code-mobile
description: Claude Code Mobile - Native mobile app for Claude Code

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:mobile
scripts.build: cd backend && bun build && cd ../mobile && bun prebuild
scripts.test: cd backend && bun test && cd ../mobile && bun test
scripts.lint: cd backend && bun lint && cd ../mobile && bun lint
scripts.type-check: cd backend && bun type-check && cd ../mobile && bun type-check
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd backend && bun install && cd ../mobile && bun install
